hidden.name: damage_display
hidden.value: ${weapon_baseDamage+(mht_display*2)+switchCase(string(weapon_category), '0', axe_damage_bonus, '1', blade_damage_bonus, '2', 0, '3', bow_damage_bonus, '4', club_damage_bonus, '5', polearm_damage_bonus, '6', relic_damage_bonus, '7', spear_damage_bonus, '8', unarmed_damage_bonus+floor(mht_display*unarmed_mht_bonus), 0)}$ ${weapon_isMagical == 0 ? "Phy" : "Mg"}$ (${weapon_damageSubtype}$)

hidden.name: weapon_base_toHit
hidden.value: ${weapon_toHit+switchCase(string(weapon_category), '0', axe_hit_bonus, '1', blade_hit_bonus, '2', 0, '3', bow_hit_bonus, '4', club_hit_bonus, '5', polearm_hit_bonus, '6', relic_hit_bonus, '7', spear_hit_bonus, '8', unarmed_hit_bonus, 0)+char_hit_bonus+(awa_display)*2+floor(skl_display*(weapon_category == 8 ? 1 : 0.5))}$

rowLayout.value: ${item.base_damage+(mht_display*2)+switchCase(item.weapon_category, '0', axe_damage_bonus, '1', blade_damage_bonus, '2', 0, '3', bow_damage_bonus, '4', club_damage_bonus, '5', polearm_damage_bonus, '6', relic_damage_bonus, '7', spear_damage_bonus, '8', unarmed_damage_bonus+floor(mht_display*unarmed_mht_bonus), 0)}$ ${item.isDamageMagical ? "Mg" : "Phy"}$ (${item.damage_subtype}$)

${item.base_damage+(mht_display*2)+switchCase(item.weapon_category, '0', axe_damage_bonus, '1', blade_damage_bonus, '2', 0, '3', bow_damage_bonus, '4', club_damage_bonus, '5', polearm_damage_bonus, '6', relic_damage_bonus, '7', spear_damage_bonus, '8', unarmed_damage_bonus+floor(mht_display*unarmed_mht_bonus), 0)}$ ${item.isDamageMagical ? "Mg" : "Phy"}$ (${item.damage_subtype}$)
${item.crit_criteria_a}$ ${item.crit_criteria_b}$ ${item.crit_criteria_c}$ ${item.crit_criteria_d}$ ${item.crit_criteria_e}$ ${item.crit_criteria_f}$

${item.spell_base_damage + (item.spell_damage_type == 3 ? healing_bonus : 0) + mht_display * (item.might_mod ? item.might_mod : 2)}$ ${item.damage_type_text}$ (${item.spell_damage_subtype}$)${item.alt_category ? item.alt_category : "None"}$
